newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: SOCCER-LEEDS BUY DEFENDER FROM DUTCH VOLENDAM.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LEEDS BUY DEFENDER FROM DUTCH VOLENDAM.

text.p: English premier league side Leeds United have signed Robert Molenaar, 26-year-old defender at Dutch first division club Volendam, on a three-and-a-half-year contract, Dutch ANP news agency said on Thursday.
Molenaar, voted Volendam's Player of the Year last season, is expected to make his debut on Saturday against Leicester City.
ANP said no financial details of the transfer had been disclosed.
